turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was wondering if you can help me order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large chicken and bacon pizzas both of them with gluten free crusts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem. the order of 2 large chicken and bacon pizzas, both with gluten free crust comes out to $24.99.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want me to place the order for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order. it'll b ready in 45 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
